page.title: 18PENICUIK PUBLIC LIBRARY
page.content: {Mrs Brown}is in charge of the {children's section}of the library and she told as all about it and about how to join. She gave us blue cards to fill in to get our{3 library {tickets.}Children are not fined for books overdue but they must look after them.There are{3 full-time staff and {3 part-time.}There are{22961 books}of which{6347 are in the children's section and{499 are reference only}(ie cannot be taken home).There are{10844 {members of which 2696 are children.}An average of{500 books are borrowed each {day.}The library was opened on{1st {February 1960}and is going to be modernised in the autumn of 1985. We saw the{photocopier}and the {micro-fiche}which shows all the books on different subjects on a screen.
